name: F. I. N. D.
description:
Load and fire!

All controls described in game. And anytime you can restart a level with backspace.

Made with Godot Engine by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games) in 2h 55min for Trijam #119.
I thought that the theme is "You have to find it", unfortunately I was wrong - the theme was "You have to look for it".

You can download the soundtrack if you want! I composed the song myself.

Premade assets
Player controller script, some boilerplate code and some sfx from freesound.org
